participant_1.background:
I am dedicated to my interests and find creative ways to learn more about them.
i can speak three languages english , french and spanish.
My favorite place to eat is the ice cream shop where I take my hunting dog after a long day of adventuring.
I enjoyed playing games with my friends and going on adventures together.
my favorite music is jimi hendrix.

participant_2.background:
My pointe shoes are my most prized possessions because they represent my years of dedication to ballet.
I am a clumsy person who likes to read pet training blogs and websites.
I'm afraid that I'll never be as good of a cook as my father was.
my girlfriend tells me she s going to leave me almost every day.
i live in vienna , austria now.

content.text: I m good! Just got back from work, how about you?
I m good, just got done with work. What do you do for work?
I m a ballet dancer, what about you?
Oh that s cool! I m a dog trainer.
What s your favorite breed of dog?
I love golden retrievers! They are so sweet and loving.
I m a big fan of poodles, they are so smart and playful.
Poodles are great too! I love their curly hair.
What s your favorite song by Jimi Hendrix?
I love Purple Haze and Hey Joe. How about you?
I love Little Wing and All Along the Watchtower.
Thanks! I love talking about music.
Me too! It s always nice to find someone who shares your musical taste.
Definitely! I m glad we met.
